comments:
Tested on Windows 2003 Server - Standard Edition with Arabic locale "ar_EG"
Eclipse Build ID: I20050401-1645

Description:
When naming a new test case with Arabic name or adding Arabic named methods to 
it , it cannot run

Prerequisites: 
- Please make that agent controller is running

Steps to re-create the problem:
1. In Eclipse workspace, click on main Menu "File"-->"New"-->"Project?", the 
new Project Wizard that comes up, select Java Project, click Next, give the 
Project a name, then click on Finish.
2. Switch to Test perspective by click main menu "Window"-->"Open Perspective"--
>"Other?", then select Test
3. In Test Navigator view, right click on the Java Project you created, "New"--
>"Test Element?" the New Test Element Wizard comes up.
4. Select ?TPTP Manual Test?
5. Give it an Arabic name.
6. Click on Next
7. Click Next then Click Finish.
8. Right click on the newly created test case in the navigator, then select Run 
As > Test

Expected Results:
1. The test case should be executed properly in the presence of Arabic data 
without any errors

2. In the Test Navigator view, double-click on the execution file of the test 
case "<testCaseName>.execution", then the test is supposed to run correctly

Actual Results:
1. The Arabic named test case does not work, and produces the following error 
messages when executing the test case:
	1- System.err: org.xml.sax.SAXParseException: Invalid byte 2 of 3-byte 
UTF-8 sequence.
	2- System.err:at 
com.sun.org.apache.xerces.internal.parsers.DOMParser.parse(Unknown Source)
	3- System.err:at 
com.sun.org.apache.xerces.internal.jaxp.DocumentBuilderImpl.parse(Unknown 
Source)
	4- System.err:at javax.xml.parsers.DocumentBuilder.parse(Unknown Source)
	5- System.err:at org.eclipse.hyades.test.common.util.XMLUtil.loadDom
(XMLUtil.java:135)
	6- System.err:at org.eclipse.hyades.test.common.util.XMLUtil.loadDom
(XMLUtil.java:169)
	7- System.err:at 
org.eclipse.hyades.test.manual.runner.model.util.ScriptParser.parse
(ScriptParser.java:81)
	8- System.err:at 
org.eclipse.hyades.test.manual.runner.RemoteApp.initialize(RemoteApp.java:54)
	9- System.err:at 
org.eclipse.hyades.test.manual.runner.HyadesManualRunner.initializeRemoteApp
(HyadesManualRunner.java:261)
	10- System.err:at 
org.eclipse.hyades.test.manual.runner.HyadesManualRunner.main
(HyadesManualRunner.java:175)
	11- java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: The xml script is not valid or 
the test case main block doesn't have any child element
	at org.eclipse.hyades.test.manual.runner.RemoteApp.initialize
(RemoteApp.java:58)
	at 
org.eclipse.hyades.test.manual.runner.HyadesManualRunner.initializeRemoteApp
(HyadesManualRunner.java:261)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.test.manual.runner.HyadesManualRunner.main
(HyadesManualRunner.java:17

	12- System.err:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><testScript><testSuite 
id="C6E6B15008B79E504A55B5D0B72E11D9" name="" 
location="/jproj/"ARABIC".testsuite"><testCases><testCase 
id="C6E6B15008B79E500B1BFDB0B72F11D9" name="ARABIC"/><testCase 
id="C6E6B15008B79E500BEDCCA0B72F11D9" name="ARABIC"/><testCase 
id="C6E6B15008B79E500C118140B72F11D9" name="ARABIC"/><testCase 
id="C6E6B15008B79E500C2E3100B72F11D9" name="ARABIC"/><testCase 
id="C6E6B15008B79E500C4AB9B0B72F11D9" 
name="ARABIC"/></testCases></testSuite><verdicts><verdict label="inconclusive" 
value="0" isDefault="false"/><verdict label="pass" value="1" 
isDefault="true"/><verdict label="fail" value="2" isDefault="false"/><verdict 
label="error" value="3" isDefault="false"/></verdicts></testScript>

NOTE: in Error 12, each "ARABIC" represents arabic text supposed to appear (but 
the error message contains garbage instead)

Comments:
1. When arabic text is used, manual test-cases does not work

The enablement testers have said that these major/critical/blocker defects
prevent them from making progress, and they need to finish testing on May 13.
Please fix this bug before May 13 so that they can finish testing on time.

This is a dupe of several other similar defects.

Bianca, apparently this defect is becoming more severe as it is blocking 
testers.  Can you please dupe this to the appropriate defect and look into the 
problem further?  Thanks.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 93098 ***

This scenario has been tested on Hyades 4.0.0, Build: I20050505
and the problem still remains

There has been another fix goes into TPTP build 200505101714. This is the same 
problem as bug 92200 which has been verified working in a TPTP build later 
than 200505101714. Please test against 200505101714 or later. If the problem 
still exist, please attach the .execution file here. Thanks.
Tested on 200505121000 and works so fine, Thank you Bianca ...

Closing by default since not closed by the originator in the 7+ months since being resolved.  

Please reopen if the issue is still present in the latest TPTP release or the resolution is not correct.
